'''''Double Eleven''''' is a British game development studio based in [[wikipedia:Middlesbrough|Middlesbrough, England]].

The studio is responsible for developing {{MCD}} alongside [[Mojang Studios]] and {{w|Xbox Game Studios}}, particularly with multiplayer, DLC content, and the console versions.<ref> https://web.archive.org/web/20191007142011/https://www.double11.com/2019/09/17/announcement-minecraft-dungeons/</ref>

== Games ==
Double Eleven has developed / published the following games:<ref>https://www.double11.com/games/</ref>

* ''{{w|PixelJunk Eden}}'' (PS3/Windows, 2009-2012)
* ''{{w|Call of Duty: Black Ops – Zombies}}'' (iOS, 2011)
* ''{{w|Lego Batman 2: DC Super Heroes}}'' (iOS, 2012)
* ''{{w|LittleBigPlanet PS Vita}}'' (Vita, 2012)
* ''{{w|Lego Star Wars: The Complete Saga}}'' (iOS, 2013)
* ''{{w|Lego Marvel Super Heroes|Lego Marvel Super Heroes: Universe in Peril}}'' (iOS, 2013)
* ''{{w|PixelJunk Shooter}}'' (Windows/Mac/Linux, 2013)
* ''{{w|Limbo (video game)|Limbo}}'' (PS4/Vita/ONE, 2013-2015)
* ''{{w|PixelJunk Monsters}}'' (Vita/Windows/Mac/Linux/WiiU, 2013-2016)
* ''Frozen Synapse Prime'' (Windows/Mac/Linux/iOS/Android/PS3/Vita, 2014)
* ''{{w|Goat Simulator}}'' (PS3/PS4/360/ONE/Win10, 2015)
* ''Nom Nom Galaxy'' (PS4, 2015)
* ''{{w|Inside (video game)|Inside}}'' (Windows/ONE/PS4, 2016)
* ''Lego Harry Potter Collection'' (PS4, 2016)
* ''Mantis Burn Racing'' (Windows/ONE/PS4/NSwitch, 2016-2017)
* ''{{w|Prison Architect}}'' (360/ONE/PS4/NSwitch, 2016-2018)
* ''{{w|Songbringer}}'' (ONE/PS4/Windows, 2017)
* ''Super Cloudbuilt'' (ONE/PS4/Windows, 2017)
* ''Doctor Who Infinity'' (iOS/Android/Fire, 2018)
* ''{{w|Fallout 76}}'' (ONE/PS4/Windows, 2018)
* ''{{w|Crackdown 3}}'' (ONE/Win10, 2019)
* ''This Is Pool'' (PS4/ONE/Windows/NSwitch, 2019)
* ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]'' (ONE/PS4/NSwitch, 2020)
* ''{{w|Rust (video game)|Rust}}'' (ONE/PS4, 2020)
* ''{{w|Red Dead Redemption}}'' (NSwitch/PS4, 2023)
* ''{{w|Grounded (video game)|Grounded}}'' (NSwitch/PS4/PS5, 2024)
* ''Blindfire'' (PC/PS5/Xbox Series, 2024)
